variables.name: create_vm
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to create the AzDO server vm or not.
variables.query: Switch: create the Azure DevOps server vm (true) or only generate the vhd/image (false)?

variables.name: admin_password
variables.description: String: Administrator password of the new vm.
variables.query: What administrator password should be installed into the vm?

variables.name: create_pip
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to add a public ip to the AzDO vm or not.
variables.query: Create a public IP for the Azure DevOps server vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: install_omsagent
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install the log analytics oms agent into the AzDO vm or not.
variables.query: Switch: Install the OMS Agent vm extension into the Azure DevOps Server vm (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: vhd_or_image
variables.description: String: Create a vhd or an image.
variables.query: Switch: create a vhd or an image? (valid reponses 'vhd' and 'image')

variables.name: vhd_capture_container_name
variables.description: String: Storage container where VHD will initially be stored.
variables.query: Name of the storage container to put the new vhd into?

variables.name: vhd_capture_name_prefix
variables.description: String: Prefix of the new VHD.
variables.query: What is the base name of the resulting vhd?

variables.name: vhd_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: Resource group of the storage account where the VHD is stored.
variables.query: Into which resource group should the resulting vhd be placed?

variables.name: vhd_storage_account
variables.description: String: Name of the storage account where the VHD is stored.
variables.query: Into which storage account should the resulting vhd be placed?

variables.name: image_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: Resource group of the new image.
variables.query: Into which resource group should the resulting image be placed?

variables.name: image_base_name
variables.description: String: Name of the new image.
variables.query: What is the base name of the resulting image?

variables.name: arm_client_id
variables.description: String: Client ID of the credential used to run Packer.
variables.query: What is the app/client id of the service principal to be used to create Azure resource for Packer?

variables.name: arm_client_secret
variables.description: String: Client secret / password of the credential used to run Packer.
variables.query: What is the client secret of the service principal to be used to create Azure resource for Packer?

variables.name: arm_installer_password
variables.description: String: Admin password of temp vm used by packer to create the new vhd or image.
variables.query: What is the password to use in the Packer vm?

variables.name: local_temp
variables.description: String: Packer uses a temp folder on the machine that is running Packer.
variables.query: What is the absolute path/file name of local temp? (i.e. c:\users\me\AppData\Local\temp or /tmp)
